body:
Call descriptors and calling convention sources relevant for wrappers.
- File: src/wasm/wasm-linkage.h
  - Defines architecture-specific register assignments for Wasm parameter and return registers: kGpParamRegisters, kGpReturnRegisters, kFpParamRegisters, kFpReturnRegisters for all supported arches.
  - kWasmInstanceDataParameterIndex and alignment rules.
  - LinkageAllocator and LinkageLocationAllocator helpers for allocating parameter locations (regs and stack) for call signatures.
  - kGenericJSToWasmWrapperParamBufferMaxSize constant used by builtins for buffer sizing.
- File: src/wasm/wrappers.cc
  - GetBuiltinCallDescriptor(Builtin, Zone*): constructs a CallDescriptor via compiler::Linkage::GetStubCallDescriptor and wraps in TSCallDescriptor.
  - BuildWasmToJSWrapper: for kind == kJSFunctionArityMatch/ kJSFunctionArityMismatch builds a JS call using compiler::Linkage::GetJSCallDescriptor(pushed_count+1 args); for kUseCallBuiltin uses CallTrampolineDescriptor and StubCallMode::kCallBuiltinPointer.
  - BuildCallWasmFromWrapper: constructs TSCallDescriptor from compiler::GetWasmCallDescriptor(__graph_zone(), sig, WasmCallKind::kWasmIndirectFunction), with CanThrow::kYes.
  - FromJS(BigInt to i64): obtains CallDescriptor via GetWasmEngine()->call_descriptors()->GetBigIntToI64Descriptor(needs_frame_state), then TSCallDescriptor::Create and calls Builtin::kBigIntToI64 or Builtin::kBigIntToI32Pair depending on Is32/64.
- File: src/wasm/wasm-engine.h
  - class WasmEngine holds compiler::WasmCallDescriptors call_descriptors_ and exposes call_descriptors() for wrapper code to retrieve built BigInt-to-i64 descriptor and others.
explanation: Summarizes where call descriptors come from for JS↔Wasm wrappers, including architecture calling convention tables and linkage helpers, and the path to fetch BigInt-to-i64 call descriptor used in JS-to-Wasm conversions.
